abstract: Caesars Entertainment joints contest for one of four available New York state casino licenses, posting $1 million application fee; plans to build casino resort worth more than $750 million about 50 miles north of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The gambling company, based in Las Vegas, is seeking one of the four licenses that Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has pushed as a way to revive the state’s economy.

headline.main: Caesars Making Bid for Casino in Upstate New York
headline.print_headline: Caesars Joining Contest for State Casino License

snippet: The gambling company, based in Las Vegas, is seeking one of the four licenses that Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has pushed as a way to revive the state’s economy....
